name: Finance Tracker
description: The ultimate Notion dashboard to track all your financesJuggling your finances can feel like a full-time job. Our Notion template makes it easy to manage all your finances in one place.Why Notion?Notion is available on every platform, with customizable layouts and a wide range of components and views including board view, gallery view, table view and more.Stacking up with advanced filter, sort, and search functions, Notion provides a powerful database to track years of financial data without pay
features: View account balances; Generate monthly reports; Transfer funds between accounts; Track financial goals; Set monthly budgets; Monthly view of expenses & incomes; Income tracking; Expense tracking; Subscription tracking
